title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Educational Program for Social Applications from a Quantum Learning Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and adaptability to digital environments
context.additional_context: Immersive learning experiences using VR simulations optimized for mobile environments, emphasizing knowledge sharing through learner interaction

learning_goals: Learners can explain social phenomena by applying the holistic principles of quantum learning
Learners can observe nonlinear interactions and analyze learning patterns in simulation environments
Learners can propose solutions applying quantum learning perspectives to real-world social problems through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
